about.title: About me
about.subtitle: Who is Marco?
desc: I am a Computer Systems Engineer, graduated from the Tecnológico Nacional de México in Celaya, with a solid background in both web and mobile application development. I specialize in Full Stack development and cross-platform mobile app creation, combining technical expertise, logical thinking, and a passion for building clean, functional, and user-friendly digital experiences.

With over three years of professional experience and more than six years immersed in the world of software development, I have contributed to projects across a variety of industries — from enterprise platforms to educational apps and consumer-facing digital products. I’ve worked in both multidisciplinary teams and as an independent developer, which has equipped me with an adaptable mindset, strong problem-solving skills, and a focus on delivering high-impact results.

activities.name: Full Stack Developer
text: Designed and developed modules from scratch for both the frontend and backend.
Implemented user interfaces using React and Tailwind CSS, creating custom and fully responsive components.
Built and optimized complex MySQL queries to improve database performance and efficiency.
Ensured API security by implementing JWT authentication, activity logging, and database backup policies.
Configured and managed cloud hosting with AWS, ensuring high availability and scalability.

activities.name: Web Developer Intern
text: Designed, developed, and optimized web applications, improving operational efficiency and user experience.
Implemented custom solutions that reduced load times and increased conversion rates.
Led API and database integrations, achieving greater scalability and reliability in high-demand environments.

activities.name: Software Developer
text: Developed an attendance and student management system tailored for teachers.
Implemented backend logic using PHP and MySQL for robust data handling.
Designed and optimized SQL queries to enhance system performance.
Built a mobile application using Flutter to ensure accessibility and ease of use.
Implemented secure user authentication and access control.
Designed and developed a REST API for seamless communication between frontend and backend.
